thread.title: 11 of Selena Gomez's Outfits That Were Meant to Be Seen From the Back
thread.title_full: 11 of Selena Gomez's Outfits That Were Meant to Be Seen From the Back

author: Alessandra Foresto
title: 11 of Selena Gomez's Outfits That Were Meant to Be Seen From the Back
text:
Selena Gomez Wearing Dresses With Beautiful Backs 11 of Selena Gomez's Outfits That Were Meant to Be Seen From the Back January 23,   11 of Selena Gomez's Outfits That Were Meant to Be Seen From the Back 
We've just figured out that Selena Gomez has a type when it comes to red carpet dresses â€” the kind that makes you do a double take. The "Kill Em With Kindness" singer often chooses outfits that look great from the front, sure, but most importantly they're totally impactful from the back. 
Take, for example, the Calvin Klein shimmery blue gown she wore to the 2016 Grammy Awards red carpet . Our jaws dropped as we saw her posing for the cameras with BFF and date Taylor Swift in the dress, which featured cutouts and a plunging neckline, but it was truly when she turned around that we lost it. The crisscross, barely there back that gave us a peek at one of her favorite tattoos was what made that dress legendary. Scroll ahead to see that gown and 10 more instances when all we wanted was for Selena to walk away.
